name: Music Racer
shortDescription: A musical arcade game, where you race at full speed while dodging obstacles to the rhythm of the music.
description: Available on Desktop (Steam), XBox One, Playstation 4, and Nintendo Switch.

name: Stereoload
shortDescription: Grow your fanbase for free using fangate follow for download campaigns!
description: Get more followers, grow your mailing list, and 100% free for creators. Trusted by 40,000+ artists, sign up today!

name: Songlink / Odesli
shortDescription: Automated, on demand smart links for songs, albums, podcasts and more.
description: For artists, for fans, for free.

name: Audius WordPress Plugin
shortDescription: WordPress plugin makes it incredibly easy to embed tracks from Audius.co using your favorite track URL.
description: Easily choose between the compact and card embed layouts. Multiple Audius embeds can be added to your posts and pages; simply add a new block!

name: Music Killer
shortDescription: The very first music adapting first-person shooter is here!
description: Always wanted to shoot mobs while listening to your own favorite music tracks? Now you can.

name: YouTube to Audius Importer
shortDescription: Dive into Audius using your existing YouTube videos.
description: Jump-start your Audius migration! Enter a url and the tool will import your video into Audius as an audio track!

name: Songwhip
shortDescription: Smart music links that reach every platform.
description: Increase streams with beautiful landing pages made instantly - no login, no limits, free.

name: Bass Booster Volume EQ
shortDescription: The best all-in-one iOS music player app that gives you full control to improve sound quality.
description: Stream, download from the cloud or listen to radio. Boost the bass and improve the overall sound with a 10-band equalizer.

name: Audis
shortDescription: Discover new music, artists, and mixes from all around the planet using the Audius.org free API
description: Enjoy this free app with no ads or subscription!
